content: We can't really tell what this callback URL should be from the externaltool code or the core Dataverse code. Is it just the dataverse.siteUrl option, or some Globus-specific API endpoint?
A: @Victoria Lubitch set me straight: https://github.com/gdcc/dataverse-globus/pull/5#issuecomment-3558258083
--base-href=path_to_globus_app. Got it. :smile:
